summary: The diff modifies backend/main.mo and project_state.json. The diff of backend/main.mo is truncated and does not show the actual change inside buildShuffledSectionFromArray. Without visible evidence of the filter expression being updated from Text.equal(e.primaryMuscleGroup.toLower(), group.toLower()) to Text.equal(Text.toLowercase(e.primaryMuscleGroup), Text.toLowercase(group)), REQ-20 cannot be confirmed as implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: In backend/main.mo, fix the invalid filter syntax in the buildShuffledSectionFromArray function by replacing Text.equal(e.primaryMuscleGroup.toLower(), group.toLower()) with Text.equal(Text.toLowercase(e.primaryMuscleGroup), Text.toLowercase(group)).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff of backend/main.mo is truncated and the buildShuffledSectionFromArray function body — specifically the filter expression — is not visible in the provided content. There is no direct evidence that the required substitution was made.
